name: Rest in Peace for Crying Out Loud!
name_original: Rest in Peace for Crying Out Loud!
description:
MADE FOR GLOBAL GAME JAM 2021

It’s been far too long since you’ve been able to get some sleep. Why? Your house is haunted! Ghosts screech, scream, and holler for the items that will finally lay them to rest. You’re tasked with navigating your home, eyelids heavy, trying to find the objects that will allow them to move on. Once they do, you’ll finally get some peace and quiet!

How to Play:

There are 7 ghosts to give objects to. Pick an object up and push it into the ghost. Ghosts will fade in and out depending on the time of day.

Keep an eye on your fatigue meter in the lower right-hand corner. You can manually blink to give yourself more time before you’re forced to go to bed. Be careful, though! Whenever an object is not in your view, tricky poltergeists will move it somewhere else!

Play with mouse & keyboard.

Walk: WASD

Pick Up Highlighted Object: Right Mouse Click

Blink: Space bar

Go to Sleep and use Safe Space: E key
